params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The resource name of the parent lake: projects/{project_id}/locations/{location_id}/lakes/{lake_id}

params.name: data.environment_id
params.description: Required. Environment identifier. Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens. Must start with a letter. Must be between 1-63 characters. Must end with a number or a letter. * Must be unique within the lake.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Optional. Only validate the request, but do not perform mutations. The default is false.
